item.title: CentOS notes
item.dc:creator: Anton Checkhov
item.content:encoded:
# EPEL (Extra Packages for Enterprise Linux) is a volunteer-based community effort
# from the Fedora project to create a repository of high-quality add-on packages that complement
# the Fedora-based Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) and its compatible spinoffs, such as CentOS and Scientific Linux.
rpm -Uvh http://download.fedora.redhat.com/pub/epel/5/i386/epel-release-5-3.noarch.rpm
